position: Business Intelligence | Data Analytics | Finance & Operations

positions.subtitle: Nestlé
positions.description: As an Analyst, I spearheaded zone-level reporting initiatives, translating business needs into data-driven solutions and communicating insights. I effectively organized and managed Power BI projects to meet objectives and timelines.•	Optimized existing reports through improved dashboard design and automated Excel reporting.•	Implemented Snowflake data solution across hubs and leveraged Power BI dataflows for optimized data reuse.•	Ensured data quality by creating and monitoring health check reports.•	Drove data governance by managing user access through apps and workspaces.•	Performed ETL from various data sources like SAP, SAP Analytics Cloud, Snowflake, and SQL data warehouses.•	Developed expertise in Power BI, Advanced DAX, Excel, Snowflake, SQL, Power Automate through data modeling, transformation, and visualization initiatives.
positions.title: Analyst (Business Intelligence)
positions.description_html:
As an Analyst, I spearheaded zone-level reporting initiatives, translating business needs into data-driven solutions and communicating insights. I effectively organized and managed Power BI projects to meet objectives and timelines.

• Optimized existing reports through improved dashboard design and automated Excel reporting.
• Implemented Snowflake data solution across hubs and leveraged Power BI dataflows for optimized data reuse.
• Ensured data quality by creating and monitoring health check reports.
• Drove data governance by managing user access through apps and workspaces.
• Performed ETL from various data sources like SAP, SAP Analytics Cloud, Snowflake, and SQL data warehouses.
• Developed expertise in Power BI, Advanced DAX, Excel, Snowflake, SQL, Power Automate through data modeling, transformation, and visualization initiatives.

positions.subtitle: Nestlé
positions.description: As a Jr. Analyst in Business Intelligence, I coordinated across European hubs to develop tailored reports that met market and stakeholder needs. Working closely with operations and finance, I managed existing reporting while creating 15+ new reports aligned to KPI and BI strategy implementation.•	Partnered with central data teams and local markets to gather input and provide automated Power BI solutions, reducing manual Excel processes.•	Drove adoption of Power BI through developing reports and dashboards that enabled self-service insights for business users.•	Created reports with Advanced DAX to pull and transform data from sources like SAP, SAP Cloud for Analysis, and SQL databases.•	Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, Power BI, Advanced DAX, SAP/SAP Analytics Cloud, and SQL through report design and automation initiatives.
positions.title: Junior Analyst (Business Intelligence)
positions.description_html:
As a Jr. Analyst in Business Intelligence, I coordinated across European hubs to develop tailored reports that met market and stakeholder needs. Working closely with operations and finance, I managed existing reporting while creating 15+ new reports aligned to KPI and BI strategy implementation.

• Partnered with central data teams and local markets to gather input and provide automated Power BI solutions, reducing manual Excel processes.
• Drove adoption of Power BI through developing reports and dashboards that enabled self-service insights for business users.
• Created reports with Advanced DAX to pull and transform data from sources like SAP, SAP Cloud for Analysis, and SQL databases.
• Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, Power BI, Advanced DAX, SAP/SAP Analytics Cloud, and SQL through report design and automation initiatives.

positions.subtitle: Nestlé
positions.description: As a Finance Intern, I spearheaded initiatives to streamline freight settlement processes across Nestlé's European hubs. Scheduling and leading meetings with UK, Italy, France, and Poland teams enabled me to document workflows and identify irregularities hindering operations. I drafted standardized, best practice processes for freight settlement, reducing inconsistencies across geographies.Additionally, I leveraged Advanced Excel skills to analyze SAP TM data for financial reconciliations, pinpointing and resolving discrepancies.Key Contributions:•	Standardized freight settlement workflows across 4 European hubs to drive process consistency•	Identified and recommended solutions for irregularities that disrupted hub operations•	Conducted financial reconciliations, ensuring data integrity•	Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, SAP, and Microsoft 365 through process enhancement and data analysis initiatives
positions.title: Finance Intern
positions.description_html:
As a Finance Intern, I spearheaded initiatives to streamline freight settlement processes across Nestlé's European hubs. Scheduling and leading meetings with UK, Italy, France, and Poland teams enabled me to document workflows and identify irregularities hindering operations. I drafted standardized, best practice processes for freight settlement, reducing inconsistencies across geographies.

Additionally, I leveraged Advanced Excel skills to analyze SAP TM data for financial reconciliations, pinpointing and resolving discrepancies.

Key Contributions:
• Standardized freight settlement workflows across 4 European hubs to drive process consistency
• Identified and recommended solutions for irregularities that disrupted hub operations
• Conducted financial reconciliations, ensuring data integrity
• Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, SAP, and Microsoft 365 through process enhancement and data analysis initiatives

positions.subtitle: AIESEC in India
positions.description: Participated in International Student Exchange in Łódź, Poland via. AIESEC for 6 weeks assisted as a volunteer in a project supporting Sustainable Development Goal 17 - “Partnership for the Goals” - one of the Global Goals implemented by the United Nations. The main aim of the project was to support local NGOs in daily operations to achieve their goals and have an impact on the local community.
